commit message: Temporary compatibility fix for old OpenSSH servers (2.0-2.5.2)
Add comments for strings to aid in translations.
Externalize some strings, fix indentation while I'm at it

* Fixed comment in default strings.xml
* Added translation for Deutsch (thanks, TauPan!)
* Added translation for Swedish (thanks, dalurka!)

* Update _Svenska_ translation
* Update Deutsch translation
Get rid of magic constants in font height calculation (should help with small font sizes)
Fix to SSH library to allow SSH protocol debugging
Externalize preference strings so they may be translated.

Add 'gen' to classpath for Eclipse to use in SDK 1.5
